info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 8:44PM EDT until April 06 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Catawba County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... South central Davie County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Southeastern Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Western Rowan County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 844 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles north of Huntersville, or near Lake Norman, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Salisbury, Mooresville, China Grove, Spencer, Granite Quarry, Cooleemee, Cleveland, Lake Norman, Lake Norman State Park and Sherrills Ford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
